name: Basics: Controls
pages: LTX Weapons are operated a bit differently that normal ranged weapons like bows and crossbows. On all weapons, $(l)Left Click$() fires, '$(l)R$()' (default key bind) reloads the weapon.

pages.title: Reticle Focusing
pages.text: Certain weapons allow the weapons reticle to be 'focused'. Generally these weapons will become more accurate but others have special behaviors that activate upon focusing. To focus the reticle, hold $(l)Right Click$().

pages.title: Mode Switching
pages.text: Certain weapons can cycle between different modes, the primary example being the Hanabi and its round types. To switch between modes, hold $(l)SHIFT$() and scroll your $(l)mouse wheel$().
